title: Tilray Stock’s Future Remains Cloudy as Marijuana Players Face Challenges
text:
Tilray stock (TLRY) has trailed the market and many cannabis peers in 2019, and Oppenheimer warns that despite long-term positives for the company, bargain hunters should remain cautious.

The back story. There have been more lows than highs for Tilray shareholders this year. The stock is off 63% in 2019, a period of time that’s seen the S&P 500 rise more than 18%.
